name: pitch_diameter
notes: Diameter in the center of the teeth

name: M3_hole_diameter_3d_printing
notes: Self-threading hole for M3 screw into PLA

name: y_rack_length
notes: change rack length, exact length is calculated, see next two rows below.

name: y_rack_carriage_rail_fit
notes: shrink carriage to fit the rail to compensate thermal expansion of 3d printing. set to 0 if not needed.

name: x_endstop_base_height
notes: to adjust the height of the end stop

name: y_rack_num_teeth
notes: rounded based on rack_length / pi / module

name: y_rack_length_calculated
notes: the *exact* calculated length based on num teeth

name: x_rack_carriage_rail_fit
notes: shrink carriage to fit the rail to compensate thermal expansion of 3d printing. set to 0 if not needed.
